EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing Pivotal Greenplum 6: Enterprise analytics at scale, modernized
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-6-q119]]> Pivotal Greenplum 6.0: Enterprise analytics at scale, reimagined for modern deployments
Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-6-q119]]> is a massively parallel processing analytic database based on Postgres, one of the largest and most successful open-source projects. It offers data professionals an escape from proprietary lock-in, while reducing the need for niche data management systems.
What's New?
For better consolidation of workloads in a single environment, Greenplum now includes significant transaction processing and streaming improvements for faster performance over a variety of analytic-oriented workloads -- up to 50X faster over Greenplum 5 for some applications.
For modern deployments, Greenplum for Kubernetes helps data professionals and developers reap the automation benefits of Kubernetes for easier installation, operation, and upgrades. Want to Learn More?
- Our blog has an in-depth review of the new capabilities in Greenplum <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-greenplum-postgres?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-6-q119]]>. - Attend our webinar, “Reimagining Postgres in a Modern Application Setting <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-28-reimagining-postgres-in-a-modern-application-setting-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-6-q119]]>” In this webinar Stephen O’Grady, Principal Analyst and Co-founder at Redmonk, and Pivotal’s Jacque Istok, VP of Pivotal Data Products will describe through how and where Postgres can address the important needs developers and operators face today. - You can get more information about Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-6-q119]]> on Pivotal.io, and on the Greenplum Database channel <[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIC2TGO-4xNSAJFCJXlJNwA]]> on YouTube. - Read our Greenplum for Kubernetes white paper <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/greenplum-for-kubernetes?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-6-q119]]>. - We also offer binaries for Greenplum for Kubernetes <[[https://network.pivotal.io/products/greenplum-for-kubernetes]]>, as well as extensive documentation <[[https://greenplum-kubernetes.docs.pivotal.io/1-0/index.html]]>. There’s also a brief introductory video <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D3cgubPKtdE&t=2s]]> to Greenplum for Kubernetes. - Apache MADlib is the in-database analytics library for the Postgres family, including Greenplum. The Apache MADlib site <[[http://madlib.apache.org/]]> has documentation, code, and examples to help you get started. - Our products can also be found in the AWS <[[https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/search/results?x=0&y=0&searchTerms="Pivotal+Software"]]>, Azure <[[https://azuremarketplace.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/apps/pivotal.pivotal-greenplum-azure-byol]]>, and GCP <[[https://console.cloud.google.com/marketplace/details/pivotal-public/pivotal-greenplum-byol?pli=1]]> Marketplaces to get started quickly.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
